message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a method for improving the presentation of subtitles in video using identification algorithms based on audio and visual information. This involves computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) techniques for detecting speakers and optimizing subtitle placement. The study also involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and natural language processing (cs.CL, cs.IR) aspects in evaluating the usability and effectiveness of the proposed method.
